question:
You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.
Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter
introduce yourself
describe your plans for the party
invite your neighbour to come
text: Hello, How are you? Nice to meet you, I’m glad you are my neighbour beside my house. When we met last time we are moving up the furniture, sorry about that we just talked a little bit. So let me introduce  this letter. My name is Rachel, come from Chichester, Uk. My family involve me, my husband and my 2 sons.

I’m writing this letter to you that it is about next week my home will organise a housewarming party.My friends  here in London wanna have a gathering party with me. Because we are a long time no see each other. There will be  almost 20 people coming around here. I’m afraid that would be a bit annoying for you, so I anticipate informing you, hope you don’t mind our party at all.

Mrs Rose, i would like to invite you to join our housewarming party too, we can talk more and know  about each other. It is happening on next week Friday, 11/8/2021, at 8,00pm. You can bring your family to come too. I will prepare a lot of delicious food.

Thank you again, hope we can see it  next week Friday. And here is  a bit gift for you and your family, this is my handmade bagel, i think this is enough for you and your family. May I get your feedback is it delicious ?
Hope to get your response and have a nice day. Thank you!!

error_list.error_des: The pronoun I should always be capitalized.
